job_tasks.phrase: translate business needs into solutions with respect to scope, code criteria, engineering frameworks, data analysis and recommendations
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions, aligning with the definition of Business Understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: solve business problems in all industries and for all business functions
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the focus on addressing business challenges across various sectors and functions, a core aspect of business understanding.

While 'Architect' can be broad, in the context of 'Data Engineering, Science, Consultancy and Architecture' and the mention of 'Data engineer/developer', this suggests involvement in the foundational aspects of data systems.

job_tasks.phrase: natural language processing, time series modelling and image recognition
job_tasks.justification: These are all specific types of machine learning modeling tasks that the role is expected to engage with.
The job title itself implies development and engineering responsibilities, which falls under software development.
This indicates that the role will be involved in the actual building and deployment of solutions, which are key software development activities.
While primarily a software development task, 'production' can also imply aspects of MLOps, ensuring models are functional in a live environment.

soft_skills.phrase: work closely with a lot of tech and innovation enthusiasts
work closely together with our consultants, engineers, and architects
Knowledge-sharing and cooperation across competences is very much encouraged and expected.
create insights that solve business problems
lots of freedom and responsibility as part of a young and growing team
leadership capabilities to lead less experienced colleagues

classification.rationale: The job description mentions traditional AI tasks like NLP and time series modeling but lacks specific details about Generative AI techniques or frameworks. It also emphasizes business understanding and software development without a clear focus on advanced GenAI engineering practices.
